oldentry: Popular explanation: drops of water falling.
verblex: 1. Of a liquid, to fall in small drops. English = drip.
2. To have small drops of liquid fall from something. English = drip.
3. Of a container or other object, to have a crack or a hole so that a liquid can pass through. English = leak.
nomlex: 1. Small ball shaped quantities of a liquid. English = drops.
2. A crack or a small hole in a container through which a liquid is passing. English = leak.
